statements: SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance;
SELECT session_id, attendance_time, student_id FROM Attendance;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT session_id, attendance_time FROM Attendance ORDER BY attendance_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND attendance_time < '2022-02-01 00:00:00' ORDER BY attendance_time DESC;

SELECT student_id, SUM(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'Present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_present_count, SUM(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'Absent' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS total_absent_count FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id;

SELECT student_id, AVG(CASE WHEN attendance_status = 'Present' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS average_attendance FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING average_attendance > 0.5 ORDER BY average_attendance DESC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT session_id, student_id, class_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance ORDER BY session_id DESC;
SELECT class_id, class_name FROM Classroom WHERE teacher_id = 100;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE class_id = 3 ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT session_id, student_id, class_id FROM Attendance WHERE session_id > 100 ORDER BY session_id DESC
SELECT class_name, teacher_id FROM Classroom WHERE teacher_id = 500
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) as num_sessions_attended FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id HAVING num_sessions_attended > 5
SELECT * FROM Attendance JOIN Classroom ON Attendance.class_id = Classroom.class_id
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT session_id, attendance_date FROM Attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT session_date, session_duration FROM Sessions WHERE teacher_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Students WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT session_id, session_date, session_duration, teacher_id FROM Sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY session_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, email, attendance_status, attendance_date FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT Students.student_id, Students.student_name, Sessions.session_id, Sessions.session_date FROM Students JOIN Sessions ON Students.student_id = Sessions.teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM Sessions WHERE session_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM Students JOIN Attendance ON Students.student_id = Attendance.student_id WHERE attendance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Attendance;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT session_date, session_time FROM Sessions WHERE session_id = 3;
SELECT teacher_name FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_email = 'teacher@example.com';
SELECT student_name, attendance_status FROM Attendance JOIN Students ON Attendance.student_id = Students.student_id;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE session_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attendance FROM Attendance;
SELECT session_date, session_id, attendance_status, student_id FROM Attendance WHERE attendance_status = 'Present';
SELECT * FROM Attendance ORDER BY session_date DESC, student_id ASC;
SELECT session_id, session_date, student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_id ASC
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE session_date >= '2022-01-01' AND attendance_status = 'Present'
SELECT student_id, COUNT(session_id) AS total_sessions FROM Attendance GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY total_sessions DESC
SELECT session_id, student_id, attendance_status FROM Attendance WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT student_id FROM Attendance ORDER BY student_id ASC
